column1: 1942 Jan 1st Gauge moved from Blundell's School
1951 Gauge stands on pillar 2ft 6in from ground level
1955 June 16th Gauge moved 100ft WSW – alt 240ft  – 3ft 6in on pillar
Average accepted but may be 1 1/2-2ins low
Cowley Lodge, Blundell's Road, next to Redlands row of houses – on 1972 OS map
NGR given on 1950 sheet is 700yds NW of School, not 500yds WSW
